mapper.select: select u.name name, u.code code, to_char(u.birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, u.gender gender, u.locationNo locationNo, l.si si, l.gu gu, l.dong dong, u.status status, i.saveName saveName from users u, location l, images i where u.userNo = #{userNo} and u.locationNo = l.locationNo and #{userNo} = i.useNo
SELECT locationNo, si, gu, dong FROM location WHERE gu || dong LIKE REPLACE('%'||#{keyword}||'%', ' ', '') order by locationNo asc
